newFeatures.title: More OpenAI models available in Mia-Assistant
description: This release adds the availability of the selection of more OpenAI models from Mia-Assistant chat, allowing you to choose the model that best fits your workflow.

bugFixes: When using the [Orchestrator Generator](/docs/products/console/company-configuration/providers/extensions/orchestrator-generator/overview), the sent payload now correctly includes also emptyDirs and serviceAccounts information belonging to each microservice.
We fixed an issue that prevented more than 10 extensions from being displayed in the Extensions Manager section of the Company Overview.

newFeatures.title: Kango
description: The new version `v0.5.2` of the _Kango_ is available!
The support for `connection` key in [configuration file](/docs/14.4.0/products/fast_data/fast_data_engine_v2/kango/configuration#configuration-file) has been added.
For more information check out the service [changelog](/docs/14.4.0/products/fast_data/fast_data_engine_v2/kango/changelog).

newFeatures.title: Mongezium
description: The new version `v0.4.3` of the _Mongezium_ is available!
The support for `connection` key in [configuration file](/docs/14.4.0/products/fast_data/fast_data_engine_v2/mongezium_cdc/configuration#configuration-file) has been added.
For more information check out the service [changelog](/docs/14.4.0/products/fast_data/fast_data_engine_v2/mongezium_cdc/changelog).

newFeatures.title: Stream Processor
description: The new version `v0.5.4` of the _Stream Processor_ is available!
It has been added the support of a DLQ, useful to isolate unprocessable messages and prevent degradation or blockage of the main flow, ensuring system resilience and continuity in data processing.
For more information check out the service [changelog](/docs/14.4.0/products/fast_data/fast_data_engine_v2/stream_processor/changelog).

improvements.title: Authorization Service
description: The new version `v3.0.0` of the _Authorization Service_ is available!

**BREAKING CHANGE!** Starting from version 3.0.0, route matching has been made stricter. Non-defined routes will no longer match existing route configurations with prefix names, but only sub-routes (but only if their configuration end with `/`).
For more information check out the service [configuration](/docs/14.4.0/runtime-components/plugins/authorization-service/configuration).

improvements.title: Back-kit
description: The new version `v1.5.22` of the back-kit library is available!
Refer to back-kit [changelog](/docs/products/microfrontend-composer/back-kit/changelog) for finer-grained details of new versions.

bugFixes: Fixed editor component formatting on text paste
